triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Core machine learning paradigm that offline RL builds upon for decision-making from data.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Modern deep RL methods are specifically discussed as the context for offline RL challenges and solutions.

triples.name: Robotics
triples.relevance: One of the key application domains where offline RL could enable automation.

triples.name: Health care
triples.relevance: Healthcare is cited as an important decision-making domain where offline RL methods could be applied.

triples.name: Education
triples.relevance: Education is mentioned as an application domain where offline RL could automate decision-making processes.
